articles.description: YouTuber and Souls-game speed runner LilAggy has slogged through a 14-hour stream to eventually finish Elden Ring in just under an hour.
articles.content:
Holy shit.
We were already pretty blown away by YouTuber niko bellic’s Elden Ring speed run, which he completed in about two hours without dying once. That’s real talent right there.
